bill.constitutionalAuthorityStatementText: [Congressional Record Volume 164, Number 46 (Thursday, March 15, 2018)]From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]By Mr. TED LIEU of California:H.R. 5293.Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuantto the following:U.S. Constitution, Article I, Section 8, Clause 18[Page H1652]

item.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

item.title: H.R. 5293, a bill to make technical amendments to update statutory references to certain provisions that were formerly classified to title 50, Appendix, United States Code
item.description: Ordered reported by the House Committee on the Judiciary on April 11, 2018

summary.text: This bill makes technical amendments to the U.S. Code to revise references to statutory provisions formerly classified to title 50, Appendix-War and National Defense

bill.title: To make technical amendments to update statutory references to certain provisions that were formerly classified to title 50, Appendix, United States Code.

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
